lyrics:
17 contributorsmy selfish heart lyricsverse 1
my selfish heart wasnt being no good to you
at least not the way it intended to oh
your love was young but it warmed my old soul
when i said goodbye i wasnt ready no whoa

refrain
but i dont wanna waste your time
no you deserve to find the love of your life
one day youll marry such a lovely wife
and hopefully well be fine

chorus
baby lets keep in touch oh
cause im not what you need
but ima miss you so much
im too focused on this dream
and your kiss is a drug that pulls me back so quick
until i pull us apart well forgive my selfish heart

postchorus
hey baby lets keep in touch
you got my number baby go ahead and call it up
you got my number baby go ahead and call it up
you got my number baby go ahead and call it up
go ahead and call it up go ahead and call it up
you might also likeverse 2
you were the best but im never gon let you know
each and every day you call me beautiful
you deserve the world and soon the worlds gon come around
and it breaks my heart to have to let you down yeah

no you deserve to find the love of your life
one day youll marry such a lovely wife
and hopefully well be fine

but i hope that we can still be okay
